WHETSTONE.AddMenuButtonHint: Adds a button the to sidebar settings menu for quick access to the Whetstone config.
WHETSTONE.Author: Author
WHETSTONE.ColorThemeDeleteMessage: Are you sure you wish to remove this color preset? This action cannot be undone.
WHETSTONE.InvalidColorFormat: Invalid Color Format! Must be in hexadecimal format '#rrggbb'
OCEANBLUES.bg-colorHint: Used in dialog and sheet headers.
OCEANBLUES.bg-image-windowHint: Background image used for window titles and the sidebar.
OCEANBLUES.bg-window-blendmodeHint: Color blend for window titles and sidebar.
OCEANBLUES.bg-color-sheetHint: Used for dialog and sheet window backgrounds.
OCEANBLUES.bg-image-sheetHint: Background image used for sheets and dialogs.
OCEANBLUES.text-light-colorHint: Used for text on dark backgrounds.
OCEANBLUES.text-dark-colorHint: Used for text on light backgrounds.
OCEANBLUES.text-selection-colorHint: The background color for selected text.
OCEANBLUES.fg-colorHint: Used for textboxes, buttons, and input fields.
OCEANBLUES.highlight-colorHint: Used when hovering over interface and input elements.
OCEANBLUES.border-colorHint: Used for borders around buttons and seperators.
OCEANBLUES.SubstyleHotbarHint: Activates themeing for the hotbar at the bottom.
OCEANBLUES.SubstyleToolbarHint: Activates themeing for the toolbar at the top left.
OCEANBLUES.SubstyleSceneButtonsHint: Activates themeing for the scene buttons at the top.
OCEANBLUES.SubstyleCompactSidebarHint: Makes entries in the sidebar smaller vertically to fit more on screen at once.
OCEANBLUES.SubstyleTidy5eSheetColorsHint: Overrides the css color variables for Tidy5e
OCEANBLUES.SubstyleOneJournalSheetColors: Overrides the css color variables for OneJournal
OCEANBLUES.SubstylePF2eCRBStyleHint: Allows you to changes the colros of the CRB style player sheets.
OCEANBLUES.SubstylePF2eSheetColorsHint: Overrides the four background colors for Pathfinder 2e sheets
